body.p: D Edmunds is ^quite^ a young man of very respectable parentage and union sentiments this boy soon tireing of his folly returned and took the oath and has behaved himself extremely well. and having commited some raids was indicted and he was fined ^at the Todd circuit court Oct Term^ $200 00/100 being a poor but respectable young man and we aske the clemency of tGov Bramlett believing him in every way

U E. Kennedy
Ben T. Perkins

Todd Cir Ct
vs
D. Edmond
$200,
Trespass
Remitted 1st Dec 1865
